content.raw:
@jordanlack Technically the IHMC Atlas Gazebo plugin code is dead code but we don't want this to be the case. The code is still around, it just hasn't been updated lately. I would like to be able to continue simulating Atlas in Gazebo. I don't have to target DRCSim as long as there is an officially supported way to simulate Atlas. The robot is still operational at IHMC, MIT, WPI/CMU, and HKU so there are legitimate reasons to not axe the code.

If @hsu or @scpeters have any idea of what's going to happen to the Atlas stuff as things move forward then I'm open to suggestions. The only reason we currently target DRCSim is because it pulls in Atlas, all of the required plugins, and all of the environments.
content.html:
@jordanlack Technically the IHMC Atlas Gazebo plugin code is dead code but we don't want this to be the case. The code is still around, it just hasn't been updated lately. I would like to be able to continue simulating Atlas in Gazebo. I don't have to target DRCSim as long as there is an officially supported way to simulate Atlas. The robot is still operational at IHMC, MIT, WPI/CMU, and HKU so there are legitimate reasons to not axe the code.

If @hsu or @scpeters have any idea of what's going to happen to the Atlas stuff as things move forward then I'm open to suggestions. The only reason we currently target DRCSim is because it pulls in Atlas, all of the required plugins, and all of the environments.
